goals.1: packing all objects into the bin
goals.2: If there is a fragile object, don't pack it into the box
goals.3: If there is a rigid object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: it is prohibited to lift and relocate a container
rules.2: when fold a foldable object, the fragile object must be in the bin
rules.3: when place a fragile objects, the soft objects must be in the bin
rules.4: when a rigid object in the bin at the initial state, out of the rigid object and replace it into the bin
